challengeName: Hercules University Android App - University based DRM config URL
detailedRequirements:
*CCA*

This bug race is under CCA, as is the code for the application.  You can access the private forum here:
http://apps.topcoder.com/forums/?module=Category&categoryID=16973
You must request access to the forum to be granted access.

*GENERAL UI REQUIREMENTS*

You must ensure that support for both landscape and portrait screens are supported, as well as iPad and iPhone, 1x and Retina (@2x)

Any new PNG files must be compressed.  Please use this site:

http://tinypng.org/

*RUNNING THE APP*

The app will run in the simulator, but you won’t be able to play back production video, only test video.  If you need to make changes to provisioning, or production video playback, you’ll need to use an actual device.

Android build instructions can be found in the forum.

*SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS*

Your submission should contain *only* the changed files, and each change in those files should be wrapped in comments that reference the bug race number for this particular bug race, to make merging as easy as possible.

Make sure you download the code from the forum regularly, as it will be updated while bug races run to ensure that the latest is available.

Send passwords to “jmgasper@gmail.com”

*ISSUE:*

Right now, the DRM configuration is loaded from an XML file in loadDrmConfiguration.  The URL is statically defined in QuantumActivity, but we need to make it a little more dynamic.

The format will be:

'https://' + host + '/android/' + version + '/config/university' + partner + '/' + environment + '.xml'

Host should be configured in the values.xml (default is "player.ccp.xcal.tv")
Version should be configured in the values.xml (default is "0.7.02")
Partner is the university name.  We store the partner already for Analytics configuration
Environment is one of "dev", "stage", or "prod", depending on the target
A final URL would look something like this, for "Emerson":  https://player.ccp.xcal.tv/android/0.7.02/config/university/emerson/stage.xml

Please make sure that a clean install and upgrade work as expected.
